name: Divine Emergence: REtake
description:
It's all over.

Our reality shattered into fragments of the past and images of the future. The last refuge in the ruins of a bygone world was created in order to answer the final question.
Is a human able to find the way back?

This visual novel offers a unique experience of immersion in the last world, where you should try to heal the broken mind and find the real meaning of the events on the screen. Again and again you appear in an endless loop, the only way out of which is not so easy to find.
